metatags.twitter:title: Family Separation at the U.S.-Mexico Border
metatags.og:title: Family Separation at the U.S.-Mexico Border
metatags.twitter:creator: @knowyourmeme
metatags.og:description: Family Separation at the U.S.-Mexico Border refers to the controversial practice of detaining families of undocumented migrants at the United States and Mexico boarder and, in the process, placing parents and their children in disparate locations. While neither a law nor a specific policy, the practice that has been met with wide-spread condemnation, as well as a number of controversial explanations from the Trump administration.
